A '''potion of Swiftness''' is a potion that provides [[Speed]] when used.

== Obtaining ==
=== Brewing ===
{{Brewing
|head = 1
|Sugar
|base = Awkward Potion
|Potion of Swiftness
|showvariants=1
}}
{{Brewing
|Redstone Dust
|base = Potion of Swiftness
|Potion of Swiftness Extended
|name = Potion of Swiftness +
|showvariants=1
}}
{{Brewing
|Glowstone Dust
|base = Potion of Swiftness
|Potion of Swiftness Enhanced
|name = Potion of Swiftness II
|showvariants=1
}}
{{Brewing
|Gunpowder
|base2=Potion of Swiftness
|base1=Potion of Swiftness Extended
|base3= Potion of Swiftness Enhanced
|Splash Potion of Swiftness Extended
|Splash Potion of Swiftness
|Splash Potion of Swiftness Enhanced
|name = Splash Potion of Swiftness
|ingredients = [[Gunpowder]] +<br> '''Potion of Swiftness'''
}}
{{Brewing
|Dragon's Breath
|base2=Splash Potion of Swiftness
|base1=Splash Potion of Swiftness Extended
|base3=Splash Potion of Swiftness Enhanced
|Lingering Potion of Swiftness Extended
|Lingering Potion of Swiftness
|Lingering Potion of Swiftness Enhanced
|name = Lingering Potion of Swiftness
|ingredients = [[Dragon's Breath]] +<br> '''Splash Potion of Swiftness'''
|foot=1
}}

=== Mob loot ===
A [[witch]] has an 8.5% chance to drop a potion of Swiftness if it dies while drinking the potion.

=== Generated loot ===
{{IN|Bedrock}}, the cauldron in a [[swamp hut]] contains a random potion, with a 25% chance for it to be Swiftness.
{{LootChestItem|potion-of-swiftness}}

=== Base potion ===
Potion of [[Swiftness]] is a base for brewing [[potions of Slowness]].

{{Brewing
|head = 1
|Fermented Spider Eye
|base = Potion of Swiftness
|Potion of Slowness
|showvariants=1
}}
{{Brewing
|Fermented Spider Eye
|base = Potion of Swiftness Extended
|Potion of Slowness Extended
|name = [[Potion of Slowness]]+
|ingredients = [[Fermented Spider Eye]] +<br> '''Potion of Swiftness+'''
|showvariants=1
|foot = 1
}}
